message: ...I hear the sound of a door closing.
...He was definitely mad.
I couldn't let him tamper with Ren without permission, but that was no excuse to hurt him.
He was bleeding a lot...
Trying to distract myself from the guilt, I look at Ren.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren. Are you really okay?"

name: 蓮
message: "Yes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What did he do?"

name: 蓮
message: "He seemed to be checking my performance."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's it?"

name: 蓮
message: "Apparently, I was infected with a worm during our last Rhyme battle."

name: 蒼葉
message: "A worm... Seriously?"

name: 蓮
message: "Yes. It happened when I took that hit. It didn't appear to be doing anything, but he repaired it for me anyway."
So... he was helping Ren?
...Damn it.
Even if it was in the heat of the moment, I did something really awful.
I want to apologize... but judging by his reaction and his personality, he'll probably shut me out.
It'll probably just make him angrier, really.
What should I do?
Apologize? Or let it go...
I sit down on the couch, cradling Ren in my arms.

Noiz...<K>
I don't get him at all.
I can't even tell if he's a good guy or not.
I stare at the door behind which he vanished.
...I really should apologize.
I go to the door and knock gently.
...No answer.
I guess he really is mad...

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sorry."
After muttering a soft apology, I enter the adjacent room.
It's a simple, tidy bedroom.
I set Ren on the bed and lie down next to him.
With a long, deep sigh, I close my eyes. I still have a bit of a headache.
Noiz's injury still weighs on my mind.
...Tomorrow, I'll apologize properly.

I also need some more concrete information on Toue.

Tomorrow...
My thoughts scatter, and I drift off to sleep.
